name: Ultimate Downloadable Products for WooCommerce
author: ethereumicoio

sections.description:
Ultimate Downloadable Products for WooCommerce plugin allows to display downloadable files on a product page.

This plugin is ideal to sell digital products to show customers what they will get after a purchase.

It can be a valuable addition to your NFT selling store with the NFT WordPress Plugin Kit!

FREE Features

  • Option to show a Downloads tab with downloads list on the product page
  • Shortcode [ultimate-downloadable-list] to display downloadable files on a product page (with no ability to download)
  • Option to show image thumbnails for downloads of type image

PRO Features

The PRO version includes all FREE features, plus:

  • Option to specify the thumbnail width for downloads of type image
  • Option to show blurred thumbnails for downloads of type image
  • Option to specify the thumbnails blur strength for downloads of type image
  • Variable Downloadable products support
  • Archive file contents display
  • RAR and ISO archive type upload support

Roadmap

The functionality planned in next versions:

  • Option to listen audio file sample
  • Option to see video file sample (blurred and minified)
  • Option to show mime type icons for documents
  • Per product Downloads tab show setting
  • Per product blurred images preview setting
  • Per download blurred images preview setting
  • Allows file download only after a period of time specified after a purchase date
  • Allows file download only after a period of time specified after a date specified
  • WCFM frontend feature compatibility
  • Dokan frontend feature compatibility
  • WCVendors PRO frontend feature compatibility

l10n

This plugin is localization ready.

Languages this plugin is available now:

  • English
  • Arabic (عرب)
  • Czech (čeština)
  • Danish (Dansk)
  • German (Deutsche)
  • Greek (Ελληνικά)
  • Spanish (Español)
  • Persian (فارسی)
  • French (Français)
  • Hebrew (עִברִית)
  • Hindi (हिन्दी)
  • Indonesian (Bahasa Indonesia)
  • Italian (Italiano)
  • Japanese (日本)
  • Korean (한국인)
  • Malay (Melayu)
  • Norwegian (Norsk)
  • Netherlandish (Nederlands)
  • Polish (Polski)
  • Portuguese (Português)
  • Russian (Русский)
  • Slovak (Slovenský)
  • Finnish (Suomalainen)
  • Swedish (Svenska)
  • Thai (ไทย)
  • Philippine (Pilipinas)
  • Turkish (Türk)
  • Vietnamese (Tiếng Việt)
  • Chinese (中国人)

Feel free to translate this plugin to your language.
sections.installation:
• Install and activate it as you would any other plugin.
  • Make a new WooCommerce downloadable product.
sections.faq:
How to configure server to support RAR, 7z or ISO?

Follow recommendations from this guide please.

Contact the PRO version support for help.
sections.changelog:
= 1.3.1

  • freemius library version update

= 1.3.0

  • Option to show image thumbnails for downloads of type image released in a free plugin version

= 1.2.0

  • Zip and other archive types content display added
  • RAR and ISO archive type upload support

= 1.1.0

  • Variable Downloadable products support

1.0.0

  • Initial release.
